text: Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, a'molaşon hamcun saroʙe dar ʙijoʙone hamvor ast, ki [az dur insoni] taşna onro oʙ mepindorad, to on ki nazdikaş meşavad [va] cize namejoʙad va [a'moli kofir niz saroʙest, ki sude ʙarojaş nadorad va dar ivaz] Allohro nazdi xeş mejoʙad, ki hisoʙaşro ʙa tavri komil medihad va Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasī sare' ast
